name: Elevator Joe: City Hotel Management Tycoon Sim
name_original: Elevator Joe: City Hotel Management Tycoon Sim
description:
WARNING: Very addictive game! Play at your own risk!

"...Cute design, great layout, challenging gameplay, interesting content." - gamesinasia.com

"...Elevator Joe brings about the same level of addiction hidden inside this otherwise casual and innocent looking game." - abuggedlife.com

From the makers of the hit game Streetfood Tycoon comes another fun and addictive strategy app--Elevator Joe, a time management/elevator simulation game where you have to bring tiny people called Chibizens to their destination floors as fast as you can! Along the way, you can upgrade your elevator, work your way through scenarios, unlock various items and customize your tower.

If you love tycoon, simulation and strategy games, you will love Elevator Joe.

Key Features:

- Unlock all 10 floors
- Unlock dozens of upgrades
- Unlock dozens of stores for your tower
- Over 50 time management challenges to complete
- Challenge your friends on Game Center
- Guaranteed fun for the entire family!

Grab Elevator Joe now--it's totally FREE!

PLEASE NOTE! Elevator Joe is completely FREE-TO-PLAY but some game items can also be purchased using real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases from your device settings. Elevator Joe DOES NOT require an internet connection to play.
